description.english: You just walked a thousand miles!

description.english: What an amazing race that was! Thrilling action all around!
description.german: Was für ein unglaubliches Rennen das war! Spannende Action überall!
description.french: Sacrée course ! Bonjour les sensations fortes !
description.spanish: ¡Qué carrera tan magnífica! Fue atrapante de principio a fin.
description.schinese: 那是一场多么精彩的比赛啊！惊心动魄！
description.japanese: 素晴らしいレースだ！終始ハラハラドキドキだったよ！
description.swedish: Vilket fantastiskt race det var! Action hela vägen!
description.koreana: 멋진 레이스였어요! 계속 스릴 넘치는 액션이 펼쳐졌네요!
description.tchinese: 這場比賽真是精彩！隨處可見刺激的動作！
description.brazilian: Que corrida incrível! Ação eletrizante por todo lado!
description.turkish: Ne heyecanlı yarıştı ama! Heyecan her an tavan yaptı!
